title: Publisher Rocket - Full Tutorial on How to Use Publisher Rocket for KDP 2024
description:
Join me for this 30-minute comprehensive tutorial on how to successfully use the Publisher Rocket platform to publish better books for Amazon KDP (Kindle Direct Publishing).
With 5 easy-to-follow sections, you can use this software to find:
1. Keywords for your title, subtitle and 7 Backend Keyword boxes
2. Discover Niches and obtain data
3. Source Amazon Ad Keywords for your campaigns
4. Complete Compeitor Research 
Plus much more!
For the Reverse ASIN Tool Tutorial, view here: https://youtu.be/Q9hc73YLcXQ

PLEASE NOTE: The price of Publisher Rocket has increased to $199 since this video was filmed.
